title: Lucifer's Friend - Awakening (2015) [FLAC]
description:
Lucifer's Friend - Awakening
Label: Lucifer's Records - LF001CD
Format: 2 x CD, Compilation
Country: Germany
Released: 2015
Genre: Rock
Style: Hard Rock, Progressive, Kraut Rock

CD1 is a 'best of' compilation:
tracks 1-4 from Lucifer's Friend (1970)
track 5 from Where The Groupies Killed The Blues (1972)
tracks 6 & 7 from Mind Exploding (1976)
track 8 from Banquet (1974)
tracks 9 & 10 from Mean Machine (1981)

CD2 includes 4 new songs, recorded October-November 2014

Tracklist:

CD1:
01. Ride the Sky	2:55
02. In the Time of Job	4:04
03. Keep Going	5:26
04. Toxic Shadows	7:01
05. Burning Ships	4:34
06. Fugitive	4:55
07. Moonshine Rider	4:47
08. Dirty Old Town	4:46
09. Fire and Rain	4:42
10. Hey Driver	4:16

Bonus CD2:
01. Pray	4:14
02. Riding High	5:00
03. Did You Ever	4:16
04. This Road 	3:48


Personnel:

John Lawton - vocals
Peter Hesslein - guitar, keyboards
Dieter Horns - bass

Stephan Eggert - drums (CD2)
Peter Hecht - keyboards (CD1)
Addie Rietenbach - drums (CD1 tracks 1-5)
Curt Cress - drums (CD1 tracks 6 & 7)
Herbert Bornholdt - drums (CD1 tracks 8-10)
